perks.name: Balanced Distribution
perks.desc: Your Primary Weapon deals 10% more Damage, but your Secondary Weapon deals 10% less Damage.

perks.name: Signal Jammer
perks.desc: Enemies marked by Auspex Scan cannot call for reinforcements and automatically explode upon attempting to do so.

perks.name: Radiating Impact
perks.desc: A Melee Finisher additionally deals area-of-effect Damage that scales with difficulty in a 10-metre radius. Cooldown is 90 seconds.

perks.name: Heightened Vigour
perks.desc: After a perfectly timed Parry or Dodge, you deal 10% more Melee and Gun Strike Damage, do not lose control upon taking Heavy Hits and you cannot be knocked back for 10 seconds.

perks.name: Plasma Boost
perks.desc: When the Plasma Incinerator is 30% Overheated, its Damage increases by 40% and their Charged Shots use 1 less energy.

perks.name: Kraken Penetrator Rounds
perks.desc: Bolt Weapons penetrate 1 more enemy.

perks.name: Emperor's Judgement
perks.desc: After a Finisher, the equipped Ranged Weapon reloads automatically, and your Primary Weapon deals 20% more Damage for 10 seconds.

perks.name: Relentless Pursuit
perks.desc: After a Gun Strike, Ranged Damage increases by 25% for 5 seconds.

perks.name: Versatility
perks.desc: After switching Weapons, your Secondary Weapon does 25% more Damage. The Effect lasts until reloading or switching back to your Primary Weapon.

perks.name: Secure Stockpile
perks.desc: Equipment Charge is restored by 1 for all Squad Members. Cooldown is 60 seconds.

perks.name: Steady Aim
perks.desc: Weapon Spread and Recoil is reduced by 20% and Ranged Damage against Terminus-level enemies is increased by 20%.

perks.name: Emperor's Vengeance
perks.desc: Killing a Majoris-level or higher enemy restores your Primary Weapon's Ammo by 1 magazine. For Primary Weapons that don't reload, 20% of maximum Ammo capacity is restored instead. Cannot exceed maximum Ammo capacity. Cooldown is 30 seconds.

perks.name: Vital Data
perks.desc: Scanning an Extremis- or Terminus-level enemy restores Auspex Scan's Charge by 50%.

perks.name: Aligned Aim
perks.desc: Ranged Damage increases by 15% for all Squad Members.

perks.name: Transhuman Physiology
perks.desc: All Squad Members restore 30% more Contested Health from Ranged Damage.

perks.name: Battle Focus
perks.desc: A perfectly timed Parry or Block gives the parried enemy a mark from Auspex Scan.

perks.name: Priority Targeting
perks.desc: The Mark from Auspex Scan lasts 8 seconds longer (base: 8), but Auspex Scan ignores Minoris-level enemies.

perks.name: Target Lock
perks.desc: Enemies marked by Auspex Scan take 75% more Equipment Damage.

perks.name: Close Targeting
perks.desc: When Auspex Scan is in cooldown, Melee Damage increases by 25%.

perks.name: Improved Efficiency
perks.desc: Scanning any 10 enemies or 3 Majoris-level or higher enemies with one Auspex Scan restores Equipment Charge by 1.

perks.name: Precise Calibration
perks.desc: Enemies marked by Auspex Scan take an additional 75% Damage, but Auspex Scan's radius is reduced by 25%.

perks.name: Expert Timing
perks.desc: Enemies marked by Auspex Scan take an additional 75% Damage, but the mark's Duration is reduced by 4 seconds (base: 8).

perks.name: Concentrated Fire
perks.desc: Auspex Scan zone lasts 60% longer, and enemies marked by Auspex Scan take an additional 120% Damage, but they lose the mark when they leave the scanned area.

perks.name: Marked for Death
perks.desc: A Headshot will instantly kill a Majoris- or Extremis-level enemy marked by Auspex Scan. Cooldown is 120 seconds.

prestige.name: I
prestige.desc: Acuity - Each consecutive Headshot increases Headshot Damage by 3%, up to 15%. The bonus lasts 5 seconds without a Headshot.

prestige.name: II
prestige.desc: Skilled Supplier - Ammo Reserve increases by 15%.

prestige.name: III
prestige.desc: Second Look - If no enemy has been scanned by the time the Auspex Scan zone disappears, Auspex Scan's Charge is restored.

prestige.name: IV
prestige.desc: Spare Power - Collecting an Ammo box restores Ability Charge by 25%.

prestige.name: V
prestige.desc: Resilience - Medicae Stimms restore 40% more Health.

prestige.name: VII
prestige.desc: Exigency Charge - When your Health is less than 25%, Ability Charge regenerates 15% faster.
